title: To Be Continued
overview: An accidental first kiss sparks the rest of everything… Achivich has secretly harbored strong feelings for Jirawat since high school, when he was pursuing his affections for a girl who later cheats on him. The turning point of this best friends story begins after a movie night that turns into an unexpected, tender romantic moment between the two. Achivich is heartbroken when Jirawat wants to forget everything that happened that night. Ten years passed, the former best friends return – Jirawat, now a gentle but insecure Orthopedic surgeon, and Achivich a famous superstar. They meet again and their bond grows stronger as they get to know each other. Will they be able to "continue" where they left off, that night at the movies?
